thread.title: Kit Siang: If Putrajaya serious about forex probe, sack Nor Yakcop
thread.title_full: Kit Siang: If Putrajaya serious about forex probe, sack Nor Yakcop

title: Kit Siang: If Putrajaya serious about forex probe, sack Nor Yakcop
text:
More 
Khazanah Nasional deputy chairperson Nor Mohamed Yakcop should be sacked or suspended if Putrajaya is serious about probing Bank Negara's forex losses in the 1990s, said Lim Kit Siang. 
The DAP veteran accused Nor Mohamed of being a key figure in Bank Negara's handling of forex speculation activities, which reportedly amounted to some RM30 billion.
